channel.title: Few Client Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys just got a few quick questions:
1) Whats the difference between 317, 474, 508, 562 etc... is it only gfx or do they run different/faster etc.
2) Whats the difference between renamed, non-renamed, bluur's, Galkons. How do i tell what one i have
3) Is a web client recommended. I know they increase traffic but increases people advertising and cheating
4) How do I make my file size smaller. Whats safe to take out, whats not.
Thanks :)

item.title: Few Client Questions
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

in a client you can take out the notepad files…

example. the is a editable tex (notepad) file and a .CLASS file beside it… if you take out the notepad ones it will not affect the client but you will no longer be able to edit it

Read full topic

item.title: Few Client Questions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. It’s each version of RuneScape basically. With each new version you get new items, new emotes, new monsters, a new gameframe etc.
  2. Re-Names/Non are refactored. Google refactored. As for Blurr’s and Galkons, they are just two people that made popular clients.
  3. It doesn’t increase advertising or cheating, so it’s usually recommended.
  4. In a client there isn’t really much you can take out except for custom items.

Read full topic
